com.ephesoft.dcma.da.service

Class BatchInstanceServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ephesoft.dcma.da.service.BatchInstanceServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BatchInstanceService

    public class BatchInstanceServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements BatchInstanceService
    This is a database service to read data required by Batch Instance Service.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ephesoft
    See Also:
    BatchInstanceService

      • getBatchInstances

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public java.util.List<BatchInstance> getBatchInstances(java.lang.String batchIdentifierTextSearch,
                                                            java.lang.String batchNameTextSearch,
                                                            java.util.List<BatchInstanceStatus> statusList,
                                                            int firstResult,
                                                            int maxResults,
                                                            java.util.List<Order> orderList,
                                                            java.util.List<BatchInstanceFilter> filterClauseList,
                                                            java.util.List<BatchPriority> batchPriorities,
                                                            java.lang.String userName,
                                                            java.util.Set<java.lang.String> userRoles,
                                                            EphesoftUser ephesoftUser,
                                                            java.lang.String searchString)
        An api to fetch all the batch instances by status list. Parameter firstResult set a limit upon the number of objects to be retrieved. Parameter maxResults set the first result to be retrieved. Parameter orderList set the sort property and order of that property. If orderList parameter is null or empty then this parameter is avoided.
        Specified by:
        getBatchInstances in interface BatchInstanceService
        Parameters:
        statusList - List status list of batch instance status.
        firstResult - the first result to retrieve, numbered from 0
        maxResults - maxResults the maximum number of results
        orderList - List orderList set the sort property and order of that property. If orderList parameter is null or empty then this parameter is avoided.
        filterClauseList - List this will add the where clause to the criteria query based on the property name and value. If filterClauseList parameter is null or empty then this parameter is avoided.
        batchPriorities - List this will add the where clause to the criteria query based on the priority list selected. If batchPriorities parameter is null or empty then this parameter is avoided.
        userRoles - current user.
        ephesoftUser - current Ephesoft-user.
        searchString - the searchString on which batch instances have to be fetched
        userName - String
        Returns:
        List return the batch instance list.

      • getHighestPriorityBatchInstance

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public BatchInstance getHighestPriorityBatchInstance(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> userRoles,
                                                          EphesoftUser ephesoftUser)
        An api to fetch next batch instance from batch instance table for status READY_FOR_REVIEW and READY_FOR_VALIDATION. This will have minimum priority with above restrictions and result of the query will be order by last modified. API will return those batch instance having the access by the user role on the basis of ephesoft user.
        Specified by:
        getHighestPriorityBatchInstance in interface BatchInstanceService
        Parameters:
        userRoles - Set<String>
        ephesoftUser - EphesoftUser
        Returns:
        BatchInstance batch instance for status READY_FOR_REVIEW and READY_FOR_VALIDATION and result of the query will be order by last modified.

      • getCount

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public int getCount(java.util.List<BatchInstanceStatus> batchInstStatusList,
                         java.util.List<BatchPriority> batchPriorities,
                         boolean isCurrUsrNotReq,
                         java.lang.String currentUser,
                         java.util.Set<java.lang.String> userRoles,
                         EphesoftUser ephesoftUser,
                         java.lang.String searchString)
        An api to fetch count of the batch instances for a given status list and batch priority and isCurrUsrNotReq is used for adding the batch instance access by the current user. This API will return the batch instance having access by the user roles on the basis of ephesoft user.
        Specified by:
        getCount in interface BatchInstanceService
        Parameters:
        batchInstStatusList - List<BatchInstanceStatus>
        batchPriorities - the priority list of the batches
        isCurrUsrNotReq - true if the current user can be anyone. False if current user cannot be null.
        currentUser - String
        userRoles - Set<String>
        ephesoftUser - EphesoftUser
        searchString - the searchString on which batch instances have to be fetched
        Returns:
        int, the count satisfying the above requirements

      • acquireBatchInstance

        @Transactional(readOnly=false)
public BatchInstance acquireBatchInstance(java.lang.String batchInstanceIdentifier,
                                               java.lang.String currentUser)

      • getBatchInstancesExcludedRemoteBatch

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public java.util.List<BatchInstance> getBatchInstancesExcludedRemoteBatch(java.lang.String batchNameToBeSearched,
                                                                               java.util.List<BatchInstanceStatus> statusList,
                                                                               int firstResult,
                                                                               int maxResults,
                                                                               java.util.List<Order> orderList,
                                                                               java.util.List<BatchInstanceFilter> filterClauseList,
                                                                               java.util.List<BatchPriority> batchPriorities,
                                                                               java.lang.String userName,
                                                                               java.util.Set<java.lang.String> userRoles,
                                                                               EphesoftUser ephesoftUser)
        An api to fetch all the batch instances excluding remotely executing batches by status list. Parameter firstResult set a limit upon the number of objects to be retrieved. Parameter maxResults set the first result to be retrieved. Parameter orderList set the sort property and order of that property. If orderList parameter is null or empty then this parameter is avoided. This will return only those batch instance which having access by the user roles on the basis of the ephesoft user.
        Specified by:
        getBatchInstancesExcludedRemoteBatch in interface BatchInstanceService
        Parameters:
        batchNameToBeSearched - String
        statusList - List<BatchInstanceStatus> status list of batch instance status.
        firstResult - the first result to retrieve, numbered from 0
        maxResults - maxResults the maximum number of results
        orderList - List<Order> orderList set the sort property and order of that property. If orderList parameter is null or empty then this parameter is avoided.
        filterClauseList - List<BatchInstanceFilter> this will add the where clause to the criteria query based on the property name and value. If filterClauseList parameter is null or empty then this parameter is avoided.
        batchPriorities - List<BatchPriority> this will add the where clause to the criteria query based on the priority list selected. If batchPriorities parameter is null or empty then this parameter is avoided.
        currentUser - String
        userRoles - Set<String>
        ephesoftUser - EphesoftUser
        Returns:
        List<BatchInstance> return the batch instance list.
